meanings: wish, hope, want, (formal) desire, (간절히) long for, (기대하다) look forward to

vlive.korean: 근데 정말 그러길 바라? Do you really want that? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 정말 난 친구인거네...[넘버식스] ep5.
용복아! 맛있게 먹길 바라! Felix! I hope that you enjoy eating it! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Felix! I hope that you enjoy eating it!

vlive.korean: 앞으로도 행복하길 바라요 이건가? I wish your happiness, is that right? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 미리 크리스마스에 찾아온 안드로메다 🎄
vlive.english: I wish your happiness, is that right?

vlive.korean: 너도 오늘 하루도 힘내길 바라... I hope that you work hard today, too... 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] I'll be there💜
vlive.english: I hope that you work hard today, too...

vlive.korean: 진짜 뭐랄까 평소에 바라전 그런 것 중 하나였어 뭔가... It was one of the things that I wanted my entire life. 듣기 View video Dingo Freestyle / 딩고프리스타일 : 염따가 성공하면 가장 하고 싶었던 것은?? [힙합 다모임 비하인드 클립] 쌈디 염따 딥플로
vlive.english: It was one of the things that I wanted my entire life.

examples.korean: I just hope it doesn’t get worse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 악화되지 않기만을 바라. DARAKWON
examples.english: I just hope it doesn’t get worse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I play the chambara game every day. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 매일 참바라 게임을 한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I play the chambara game every day. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They carried him off on a stretcher. I hope he’s ok. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그를 들것으로 싣고 나갔어. 그가 괜찮기를 바라. DARAKWON
examples.english: They carried him off on a stretcher. I hope he’s ok. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Feeling a little sick after dinner. I hope it’s not food poisoning. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저녁 먹은 뒤로 좀 안 좋아. 식중독이 아니길 바라. DARAKWON
examples.english: Feeling a little sick after dinner. I hope it’s not food poisoning. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty... But I am too busy thinking about myself. (Edith Sitwell) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내게 겸손함을 기를 시간이 있었더라면 하고 때때로 바라왔다. 그러나 나는 나 스스로에 대해서 생각하느라 너무 바쁘다. (이디스 시트웰, 겸손명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty... But I am too busy thinking about myself. (Edith Sitwell) Add to Wordbook
